WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing since it's the same as issue 8511, which has more comments. Please refer to that issue for updates.
WorkItem.Description:
When the sample configuration file is generated, the declaraction of configuration section is using the type namespace as assembly name. This causes a configuration exception when the section type namespace is not the same as the assembly.
 
For example if I a have a ReportingSection in MyNamespace.Configuration located in MyCompany.MyAssembly, the sample configuration file will show:
 
<configSections>
	<section name="reporting" type="MyNamespace.Configuration.ReportingSection, MyNamespace.Configuration"/>
</configSections>
 
Instead of :
 
<configSections>
	<section name="reporting" type="MyNamespace.Configuration.ReportingSection, MyCompany.MyAssembly"/>
</configSections>
WorkItem.Summary: Generated configuration uses type namespace instead of type assembly name for section declaration
